resources.string: A vector graphics spaceship, in a retro style with large fins, in a bluish gray color
Perform credentials to view personal information.
Perform resident admin credentials to access destination portal.
The task management service has encountered a problem. Please contact your system administrator.
Perform admin credentials to view protected details.

There are a lot of problems in the world that will likely not be resolved in my lifetime. In many cases, it\'s impossible to know if my actions even impact that resolution. This leads to a big question: how do I motivate myself to approach an issue that I will never see the end of, and might not even be able to affect?

This app is a conceptual art piece, presented as a mobile game. There are basically two mechanics in 1 kly: tasks, and the slow march of time. Neither of those will get you to the end, for almost everyone who might read this. Don\'t worry too much, though. Check in when you can. We got this.
